summary: Psumiku the Lust Maiden is a follower / marriage NPC that is found in Riverwood\'s Sleeping Giant Inn. This is mainly a test modification to see if I could add a follower / NPC to Skyrim via the Creation Kit.
descriptionHtml:
[b]YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO POST THIS ON STEAM WORKSHOP UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE. Due to the Steam Workshop Terms / EULA, I will not accept them for the Skyrim Workshop.[/b]

This modification uses the Apachii Sky Hair modification, which you can obtain here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168[/url]

Failure to install the Apachii Sky Hair modification may cause Skyrim to crash, or have the follower / NPC not have any hair.

Psumiku the Lust Maiden is a follower / marriage NPC that is found in Riverwood\'s Sleeping Giant Inn. This is mainly a test modification to see if I could add a follower / NPC to Skyrim via the Creation Kit. To install the modification itself, please copy the included esp file into the Skyrim/Data folder. This folder can be found within steamapps/common under the Steam program files directory.

Also note, she is essential and will not take damage (Invulnerable trait.)
author: Iyeru
